name: A depression
description: Lower than surrounding land beyond a 50 m radius, with no surface outlet for water.

name: A flat
description: Slope less than 3 degrees and not a hilltop, ridge, valley bottom or depression.

name: A hilltop
description: Higher than all or nearly all of the surrounding land beyond a 50 m radius.

name: A ridge
description: Higher than all or nearly all of the surrounding land, but elongated and extending beyond a 50 m radius.

name: A saddle
description: A depression located along the axial trend of an anticline; an area confined on two sides by downward slopes and on two sides by upward slopes.

name: A slope
description: Neither crest nor depression or valley bottom, and with slope more than 3 degrees.

name: A valley bottom
description: Lower than nearly all of surrounding land beyond a 50 m radius, but water can flow out.

name: (inapplicable)
description: None of the codes in the table are applicable in the context of this particular station/platform.
